item.description: Let's get together over at Maria's house in Upton-Just next door...Cheer the Red Sox on and have some pizza, women and beer...Sounds like a party! The weekend is not a washout after all!!! Come on over. Maria is a very cool member of our group and a heck of alot of fun. So get over to her house or else...Game starts at 8:30. Party starts at 7:30ish.

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Pizza-Beer-Women-Red Sox
